Instruction: In a blender, combine frozen acai puree, frozen mixed berries, spinach leaves, almond milk, and chia seeds.
Blend until smooth and creamy, adding more almond milk if needed to reach desired consistency.
Pour the blended acai mixture into a bowl.
Top with granola, fresh blueberries, and sliced banana.
Serve immediately for a nutritious and delicious breakfast or snack!
